description:
Yunoki continues to insult Hino, telling her to quit the concourse. The next day, Hino tries to tell her two friends about Yunoki`s sudden negative personality but before she can tell them, they spurt on about their love for Yunoki. She encounters Amo at the stairway, and as she tries to tell her about Yunoki, she hears Yunoki`s voice behind her. Surprised, she slips on the stairs and falls down...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 後ろめたさのピアニッシモ
